sentence.idiomatic: The twenty-ninth Olympic Games will be held in Beijing.
What do you think of this exhibition?
Do you know where the next Olympic Games will be held?
Every athlete wants to get a gold medal.
He got another gold medal.
How many gold medals did you get in all?
He is in first place now.
Are you in first place?
You are in last place.
Don't worry, that is his forte.
Everyone has their own strong points.
She is really good at using her strengths.
Track and field is one of the Olympic events with the most medals.
She isn't participating in this track and field competition.
He is a famous track and field athlete.
She once again broke the record.
During this competition he broke the world record.
The early morning cock's crow broke the quietness of the country.
This record has long been monopolized by American athletes.
He broke the record which had been monopolized by westerners in the 100-meter race.
This company has monopolized this area's entire market.
Our research has again made a breakthrough progress.
Our team had a breakthrough during this sports meet.
Their medical research has achieved a new breakthrough.
Who is your idol?
A lot of young people have their own idols that they worship.
He has now become everyone's idol.
Do you remember how many gold medals the U.S. got in the last Olympics?
I remember that China got 32. They came in second, didn’t they?
That’s right. But they got less silver and bronze medals than Russia did.
Everyone says that diving is the Chinese team’s strength. So, how many gold medals did they get altogether?
I think it was six.

In the last Olympics, the Chinese team also had a lot of success in track and field. One of the Chinese competitors even broke the record long dominated by the Europeans and Americans in the men’s 110 meter hurdles, achieving a real breakthrough.
I know; that was Liu Xiang. After the Olympic Games were over, in other international competitions Liu Xiang again went on to win quite a few victories. He is now the idol of a lot of Chinese people.
By the way, wasn’t there one athlete who got 6 gold medals?
Yeah, he was an American swimmer.
